legalnotice.title: 명예와 저작권
legalnotice.para: 이 문서는 우분투 문서화 팀(https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DocumentationTeam)에서 관리합니다. 공헌한 사람들의 목록을 보려면 공헌자 페이지를 보기 바랍니다.
이 문서는 Creative Commons ShareAlike 2.5 라이센스(CC-BY-SA) 하에서 이용가능합니다.
여러분의 이 라이센스 하에 우분투 문서의 소스 코드를 변경, 확장 그리고 개선하는데 자유롭습니다. 모든 파생된 작업은 반드시 이 라이센스 하에 발표되어야 합니다.
이 문서는 유용하게 사용될 것이라는 희망으로 배포 합니다만, 어떠한 품질 보증; 즉 매매의 암묵적인 보장 또는 거부란에 기술된 특정 목적을 위한 적합 같은 보증이 없습니다.
이 라이센스의 복사본은 여기에서 볼 수 있습니다: Creative Commons ShareAlike 라이센스.

copyright.holder: Canonical Ltd. 와 우분투 문서화 프로젝트의 멤버

article.para: 프로그램놀이를 선택하여 우분투의 게임들을 살펴볼 수 있습니다.
우분투는 기본적으로 아일라이어트 솔리테어, Gnometris, 지뢰찾기 등의 16 가지 게임들을 포함하고 있습니다. 추가적으로 더 많은 게임들을 설치할 수 있습니다. 이 부분에서는 여러분이 추가적으로 설치하여 플레이 할 수 있는 몇몇 게임들에 대한 간략한 정보들을 소개합니다.

sect1.title: 대중적인 게임들
sect1.para: 우분투에서 플레이 할 수 있는 가장 대중적인 게임들의 목록은 다음과 같습니다.

sect2.title: Neverball
sect2.para: Neverball, part puzzle and part action game, is a test of skill. The object of the game is to tilt the floor, rolling the ball through an obstacle course before time runs out.
Included with the Neverball package is the game Neverputt. Neverputt is a hot-seat multiplayer miniature golf game based on Neverball. Installing Neverputt by itself is not currently possible.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 neverball 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).

sect2.title: Scorched3D
sect2.para: Scorched3D is a 3D remake of Scorched Earth, an artillery duel game.
Ensure you have hardware-accelerated 3D drivers installed for your video card in order to play Scorched3D.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 scorched3d 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).

sect2.title: Chromium
sect2.para: Chromium B.S.U. is a fast paced, arcade-style, top-scrolling space shooter. As a captain of the cargo ship Chromium B.S.U., the objective is to deliver supplies to the troops on the front line. The ship has a small fleet of robotic fighters which you control from the relative safety of the Chromium vessel. More information about the game can be found on the Chromium website.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 chromium 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).

sect2.title: Frozen Bubble
sect2.para: Frozen Bubble is a clone of the popular Puzzle Bobble game. The object of the game is to shoot bubbles into groups of the same color to cause them to pop. Features include 100 single-player levels, a two-player mode, music and striking graphics. More information about the game can be found on the Frozen Bubble website.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 frozen-bubble 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).
Frozen Bubble을 플레이 하려면 프로그램놀이Frozen Bubble을 선택하세요.

sect2.title: SuperTux
sect2.para: SuperTux is a classic 2D jump and run sidescroller game in a style similar to the original Super Mario Bros. games. Features include 9 enemies, 26 playable levels, software and OpenGL rendering modes, configurable joystick and keyboard input, new music and completely redone graphics. More information about the game can be found on the SuperTux website.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 supertux 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).

sect2.title: PlanetPenguin Racer
sect2.para: PlanetPenguin Racer is a fork created from the last GPL-licenced version of Tux Racer. In addition to the levels from the original game, PlanetPenguin Racer also includes additional levels which have been developed by the community. The object of the game is to slide down the mountain, collecting fish as you go, and trying to reach the finish line in the shortest amount of time.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 planetpenguin-racer 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).
Planet Penguin Racer를 플레이 하려면 프로그램놀이Planet Penguin Racer를 선택하세요.

sect2.title: Tremulous
sect2.para: Tremulous is a free, open source game that blends a team based First Person Shooter (FPS) with elements of a Real Time Strategy (RTS) game. Players can choose from two unique races, aliens and humans. The objective is to eliminate the opposing team by not only killing the opposing players but also removing their ability to respawn by destroying the spawn structures. More information about the game can be found on the Tremulous website.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 tremulous 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).

sect2.title: Nexuiz
sect2.para: Nexuiz is a 3D deathmatch game based on the Darkplaces engine, which is an advanced Quake 1 engine built on OpenGL technology. It includes 17 maps, 15 player models, advanced UI, and an available master server allowing you to play people from all over the world. More information about the game can be found on the Nexuiz website.

step.para: Universe 저장소에서 nexuiz 꾸러미를 설치하세요(프로그램 추가 참조).

sect1.title: 아케이드 게임
sect1.para: 아케이드 게임들은 보통 단순하고 재미있는 게임들입니다. 우분투에서 이용할 수 있는 아케이드 게임들은 무척 다양하며, 다음에 소개하는 것들은 그들 중 일부에 지나지 않습니다.

listitem.para: KBounce is a game where the object is to catch several moving balls in a rectangular game field by building walls. More balls are added with each level that you complete successfully; how many can you catch?
KFouleggs clones the well-known PuyoPuyo game from Japan, and contains modifications of the well-known Tetris game principle.
Kolf는 오버헤드 뷰 방식의 미니 골프 게임입니다. 화면에 보이는 작은 바(bar)는 골프 클럽과 목표하는 샷의 방향을 나타냅니다. 이 게임은 다양한 코스, 코스 편집기, 물 웅덩이, 경사면, 모래 함젖, 블랙 홀(워프) 등을 제공합니다.
KSirtet는 테트리스 게임의 클론으로, 컴퓨터 대전은 물론 멀티 플레이어 대전도 지원합니다.
KSmiletris is yet another clone of Tetris, which is easy to learn and play.

Robots is a game where the object is to avoid a hoard of robots who are trying to catch you. With every step you make, the robots get closer to getting you and you must do whatever you can to avoid them.
KGoldrunner is a game of action and puzzle solving. Run through the maze, dodge your enemies, collect all of the gold and climb up to the next level.

KSnakerace is a fast action game where you control a snake which has to eat the food that appears on the map. The more you eat, the larger your snake grows. The goal is to eat as much as possible without colliding with the other snake or the wall, however this becomes more and more difficult the more you eat.

KTron is based on the popular computer game for two players as well as the famous movie. It is a fast paced game in which both players have to move and avoid colliding with any walls, the opponent, or the paths that you or your opponent have created.

Nibbles is a game where the user controls a snake, moving it around the board and eating diamonds while avoiding the walls. Nibbles also features network multiplayer, and up to four worms can be controlled by the computer.

KAsteroids is a fast arcade shooting game where you command a spaceship trying to survive the passage through an asteroid field. Destroy asteroids by shooting them until they split into smaller and smaller parts.

KSpaceDuel is a space game for two players, however one player can be controlled by the computer. Each player controls a satellite that flies around the Sun, all the while trying not to collide with anything and trying to shoot at the other space ship.

sect1.title: 카드, 퍼즐, 보드 게임
sect1.para: 카드 게임과 퍼즐 게임들은 매우 대중적이며, 우분투는 여러분이 선택할 수 있는 방대한 (카드 및 퍼즐) 게임들을 가지고 있습니다. 아래에 보이는 것은 보다 대중적으로 알려진 게임들의 목록입니다.

listitem.para: Aisleriot, also known as Solitaire or Patience, is a collection of single-player card games which are easy to learn and fun to play.

Blackjack is a multiple deck, casino-rules blackjack game. The object is to hold cards having a higher count than those of the dealer, without going over 21. Face card plus an Ace equals 21, Blackjack!
Freecell is another Solitaire game which is very popular on the Windows platform.
KPatience는 세계적으로 알려진 다양한 페이션스 게임들의 집합입니다. 이 게임은 Klondike, Freecell, Yukon, forty and Eight 등의 게임을 포함합니다.
KPoker는 오리지널 포커 게임의 규칙을 따릅니다. 이 게임은 컴퓨터 플레이어와 다양한 덱들을 지원합니다.
Lieutnant Skat(은)는 독일 게임인 (Offiziers)-Skat의 규칙을 따르는 2인용 카드 게임입니다. 이 게임은 컴퓨터 플레이어와 다양한 덱들을 지원합니다.
Atlantik is an open-source game client for the Monopoly-like board games played on the monopd network.

Chess (or glChess) is a chess game where you can play against the computer or against other players. Chess detects and uses known third-party chess engines for computer players, and can show the chess board in 2D or 3D.
KBackgammon follows the rules of the popular boardgame, and supports multiplayer games and games against computer engines such as GNU bg, as well as other online games.
KBlackbox is a logical game of hide-and-seek, inspired by emacs blackbox and played on a grid of boxes.
Kenolaba is a two-player tactical game which follows the rules of Abalone, where players try to shove their opponents' pieces from the game board.
KMahjongg is a clone of the well known tile-based patience game of the same name. Your goal is to empty the board by matching pieces with the same pattern.
KReversi is a two player game in which players gain the majority of pieces on the board by tactically placing their pieces in order to turn over their opponent's pieces.
KWin4, or Four wins, is a two player game which follows the rules of the famous Connect Four game. Align four pieces of the same color to win!
Mahjongg(은)는 고전 타일 게임의 1인용 버전입니다. 이 게임의 목적은 비슷한 타일의 짝을 선택하는 것입니다.
Shishen-Sho is similar to Mahjongg, and is played by removing all tiles from the field, two at a time, by matching tiles of the same type.
Anagramarama는 신속함을 요구하는 단어 게임으로, 뒤섞인 문자들에서 가능한 한 많은 단어를 만들어 내야 합니다. 만약 가능한 가장 긴 단어를 찾았다면, 다음 단계로 넘어갈 수 있습니다.
Atomix는 여러 개의 원자들을 이용하여 특정 분자를 만들어 내는 퍼즐 게임입니다. 하지만 원자들은 오직 특정한 방법으로만 움직일 수 있습니다. 복잡한 분자를 만들어 내는 것에 도전해 보십시오. 화학에 대한 지식은 필요치 않습니다.
KAtomic is a thinking game similar to Atomix, where you have to form chemical molecules out of atoms. This is done by moving each atom in a labyrinth until you have formed a complete molecule.
Sudoku is a popular number puzzle game. Use logic to complete a grid of numbers so that each row, column and large square contains the numbers one to nine.

sect1.title: 어린이용 게임
sect1.para: As well as games for adults, Ubuntu also caters for children by providing a selection of games intended to be both interesting and educational for younger age groups. A small list of available games is given below.

listitem.para: GCompris는 어린 아이들을 위한 교육적인 게임들의 집합입니다. 여러 언어를 지원하며 산수 문제와 읽기 연습 등은 물론, 애니메이션이나그림 그리기 프로그램과 같은 다양한 놀이들을 포함합니다.

KTuberling, or the Potato Game, is intended for young children. However, some adults may find it appeasing too! The object is to create your very own potato-like guy from a selection of eyes, mouths, moustaches, and other parts of the face. Other items can also be attached.

sect1.title: 전략 및 시뮬레이션 게임
sect1.para: 전략 게임은 신중하게 전술을 사용하여 다음 번 이동을 계획하는 게임입니다. 시뮬레이션 게임은 도시나 차량과 같은 것들의 실제 모델을 탐험하거나 관리하는 게임입니다. 전략 및 시뮬레이션 게임들은 꽤나 중독성을 가지며, 많은 사람들은 자신이 선택한 게임을 플레이 하며 행복한 시간을 보냅니다! 우분투에서 플레이 할 수 있는 전략 및 시뮬레이션 게임들의 몇 가지 목록들은 아래와 같습니다.

listitem.para: KBattleship is an implementation of the popular game where your goal is to sink your opponent's ships by guessing where they are on a grid. Play against the computer or against others over the Internet. "You sunk my battleship!"
KJumpingcube는 증가될 수 있는 점들을 포함하는 사각형으로 구성된 플레이 필드를 이용한 1인용 혹은 2인용 전략 게임입니다. 이 게임의 목적은 가능한 한 많은 필드를 얻어서, 보드 상에서 승리하는 것입니다.
Klickety is an adaption of the Clickomania game, which has rules that are similar to those of the Same Game. The goal is to clear the board by clicking on groups to destroy them.
KMines is a clone of the classical Minesweeper game, where you have to find hidden mines by logical deduction.
Kolor Lines, or KLines, is the KDE version of the Russian game Lines, where you have to align five game pieces of the same color in one line to remove them from the gameboard.
Konquest는 멀티플레이어 전략 게임인 Gnu-Lactic Konquest의 KDE 버전으로, 여러분의 우주 제국을 은하 밖으로 확장하여 라이벌들을 무찌르는 게임입니다.
KSokoban은 플레이어가 창고 관리자가 되어 창고 안의 박스들을 적절한 위치로 배치하는 논리 게임입니다.

KSame, inspired by Same Game, is a simple game played for a high score. The object is to remove as many of the same pieces that are touching for the most points. Speed, the amount of pieces removed at once and the movement of the mouse over possible pieces are taken into account for the final score.

sect1.title: 윈도우즈 게임
sect1.para: Many games which are available for Windows can be run on Linux by using an emulator, such as Wine or Cedega.
These emulators only work on x86 (Intel-based) computers, and will not function on AMD64 or PowerPC computers.

listitem.para: Wine is free software, and is able to run several popular games, such as World of Warcraft and Unreal Tournament. For information about Wine, see the Ubuntu wiki.

Cedega is based on Wine, but is optimized for running Windows games. Cedega is commercial software and so is not free, but it is able to run more games than Wine. For information about Cedega, see the Ubuntu wiki.
